title: Lawson Craddock Tour de France diary: ‘The start in the Basque Country was incredible’
content:
In his second diary entry, Lawson Craddock explains why stage 4 was so boring, how the team's balancing two captains, and what was behind his 'cry' during the team presentation.

Read the full article at Lawson Craddock Tour de France diary: ‘The start in the Basque Country was incredible’ on Velo.
author: ahood
